body: Some ki powers are standard monk abilities. Even if a qinggong monk selects a different ki power in place of a standard monk ability, she can select that monk ability later as one of her ki powers.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Monk/Monk Archetypes/Qinggong Monk/Ki Powers/Monk Abilities
name: Monk Abilities
